Package sensors

Interface Summary
AnalogSensor.AnalogSensorListener An interface that should be extended by each AnalogSensor type to include a method they call with their events.
BooleanSensor.BooleanSensorListener An interface that should be extended by each BooleanSensor type to include a method they call with their events.
Encoder.EncoderListener An interface that should be implemented by all listeners.
Gyro.GyroListener An interface that should be implemented by all listeners.
IntegralSensor.IntegralSensorListener An interface that should be extended by each IntegralSensor type to include a method they call with their events.
LightSensor.LightSensorListener An interface that should be implemented by all listeners.
Sensor.SensorListener An interface that should be extended by each sensor type to include a method they call with their events.
 

Class Summary
AnalogSensor An analog sensor (provides real number values) which is easily extensible by more specific sensors.
AnalogSensor.AnalogSensorEvent A SensorEvent for AnalogSensors.
BooleanSensor A boolean sensor (only provides boolean values) which is easily extensible by more specific sensors.
BooleanSensor.BooleanSensorEvent A BooleanSensor event, which is sent to listeners.
Encoder An encoder sensor.
Gyro An gyro sensor.
IntegralSensor An integral sensor (only provides integral values) which is easily extensible by more specific sensors.
IntegralSensor.IntegralSensorEvent An IntegralSensor event, which is sent to listeners.
LightSensor A light sensor
Sensor A sensor supporting listeners, encapsulating much of the functionality of the sensors in the package, and should be extended to provide more kinds of sensors.
Sensor.SensorEvent A class that should be extended by each sensor type with an event for that sensor.
Sensor.Types A class (more closely resembles an enum) that describes the various types of sensors implemented so far.
SensorThread A thread that checks all sensors for whether they should fire an event.
